Hello,

I go to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=667636 .
In "Attachments", I see that :
http://screencast.com/t/OnQnn0FJI
I see "63.16 KB", with 63.16 at the end of a line, which is incorrect typography, disturbing and ugly.
Please correct that : replace the space after the number with a non-breaking space (in HTML, " ").

Thanks,

Nicolas

-----------------------------------------------------------------

I don't think this is always used in an HTML context. Perhaps there is another filter that changes spaces to non-breaking spaces?

comments.text:
(In reply to Max Kanat-Alexander from comment #2)
> I don't think this is always used in an HTML context.

No, it's always used in an HTML context. This filter is only used in attachment/*.html.tmpl. But you could use |FILTER no_break| instead.
